org.latency4j

Interface MonitorFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsynchronousLatencyMonitorFactory

    public interface MonitorFactory

    A monitor factory implementation serves as a means of obtaining latency monitors.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LatencyMonitor getMonitor(java.lang.String workCategory)
      Returns the monitor for the given category of work.

    • Method Detail

      • getMonitor

        LatencyMonitor getMonitor(java.lang.String workCategory)

        Returns the monitor for the given category of work.

        In the case where the specified category has not been configured explicitly, this method will create an implicit statistical requirement for the category. It will also associate a basic alerts logger to the requirement, prior to returning a monitor for it.

        This call is not required to create a brand new monitor with each invocation. It is feasible that where a monitor already exists for the given category, this method will simply return a reference to it rather than creating a fresh one.

        Parameters:
        workCategory - The category of work for which the monitor is being returned.
        Returns:
        A monitor initialised to observe the requirement (implicit or explicit) which governs the given workCategory.
